turkish_example_sentence: O hukuk müşaviri aramayacaktı çünkü davayı kendi çözmek istiyordu.
english_example_sentence: He was not going to call the lawyer because he wanted to solve the case himself.
russian_example_sentence: Он не собирался звонить адвокату, потому что хотел решить дело сам.
